r.d: Zip is an extension to create, modify and read zip files.
r.n: - update bundled libzip to 1.0.1 (Remi, Anatol) - new methods for ZipArchive: setCompressionName, setCompressionIndex (Cedric Delmas) - allow to build with PHP 7 - Fixed bug #70350 (ZipArchive::extractTo allows for directory traversal when creating directories). (neal at fb dot com) - Fixed bug #70322 (ZipArchive::close() doesn't indicate errors). (cmb)
